author: TravisEz13
body:
Update the release builds to sign individual binaries.

## This would change the process to something like this:
- [x]  1. Build the binaries, extract the equivalent of the binaries without publish
    - [x]  i. A zip package similar to our current symbols package but that includes the cross-gen files.
- [x] 2. Unpack the package and Sign the binaries 
- [x] 3. create a new container, and put the signed files, finish the publish step  and run packaging and export the packages
- [x] 4. sign the packages


## additional
- [ ] Ask our peer teams to do similar.
    - [ ] PackageManagement - https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/181
    - [ ] One Get - https://github.com/OneGet/oneget/issues/319
    - [ ] Archive - **Only script** - https://github.com/PowerShell/Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive/issues/45
